_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
an6.42:3.1+an6.42:3.7^who_else_mentioned: the Blessed One, the Holy One, Buddha
an6.42:1.5+an6.42:1.8: brahmins of Icchānaṅgala, householders of Icchānaṅgala
before^an6.42:4.1^who_around: a large Saṅgha of mendicants, Nāgita
before^an6.42:4.1^who_mentioned: gods, Māras, Brahmās, ascetics, brahmins, gods, humans
before^an6.42:4.1^where: the land of the Kosalans, Icchānaṅgala
where: the land of the Kosalans, Icchānaṅgala
